TopicTitle: I can't load any of my saves...

Articles.Content:
So, I go to KSP, the game loads, I load a save, and the game closes out, while showing no crash report whatsoever. I've tried getting rid of recently installed mods, but it says: ACCESS DENIED. Please help. 

Edited February 10, 2017 by sumghai
Removed unneccessary tags and reverted to default forum font
What platform are you playing your game on - PC, Mac or console?

Access denied

So maybe something with user permissions in KSP directory? Check it.

sumghai, I'm on PC (Windows 10 specifically)

 

The Aziz, I'm not sure what directory you're talking about. (what file location is it?)

\_('-')_/

I mean, where the game is installed. 

Something like this ￼

The Aziz, I can't change permissions because my computer is saying I need permission-from my own computer.
